title: Through the Glass
text:
Through the Glass is a 2008 American-Nigerian <a href="comedy%20film">comedy film</a>, written, directed and produced by <a href="Stephanie%20Okereke">Stephanie Okereke</a>. The film was nominated for "Best Screenplay" at the <a href="5th%20Africa%20Movie%20Academy%20Awards">5th Africa Movie Academy Awards</a> in 2009.
Premise.
The film tells the story of Jeffrey (Garrett McKechnie), who finds himself stuck with an unknown baby. He then ask his Nigerian neighbour (<a href="Stephanie%20Okereke">Stephanie Okereke</a>) for help. He has to find the mother of the child before his life is completely ruined.
